sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">530884bc835a76104acac396feaad3ae</macroponent><name>stylized_text_13/now_default/text</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  const thisWeek = Number(api.data.aggregation_query_1.output.data.GlideAggregate_Query[0].count);
  const lastWeek = Number(api.data.aggregation_query_2.output.data.GlideAggregate_Query[0].count);
  
   if (lastWeek === 0) {
    return 0;
  }

  const percentageChange =
    ((thisWeek - lastWeek) / lastWeek) * 100;
  return Number(percentageChange.toFixed(1)) + " %";
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Omar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-04 23:56:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>c55d5c38831e76104acac396feaad322</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_13/now_default/text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Facility Issue Reporting System " source="x_1850913_facili_0">1cf4c9a3833d32104acac396feaad3c1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Facility Issue Reporting System ">1cf4c9a3833d32104acac396feaad3c1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c55d5c38831e76104acac396feaad322</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Omar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-04 23:56:23</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
